titleStmt.title: A true account of this present blasing-star presenting it self to the view of the world, this August 1682 to the sundry considerable remarks and observations thereupon.
titleStmt.author: Ness, Christopher, 1621-1705.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Christopher Ness. cf. NUC pre-1956.
